copy.randomizedReward: Seeds grow into one of these rewards
copy.noCurrencySelected: Please select either Ingredients or Pixie Diamonds!
copy.errorNoFriends: Explore the meadows of Pixie Hollow and meet some new friends. Then come back and send your friends Gift Sets and Postcards!
copy.errorNoPaymentBoth: Oops! You don’t have enough Pixie Diamonds or Ingredients to get this item!
copy.errorNoPaymentDiamonds: Oops! You don’t have enough Pixie Diamonds to get this item!
copy.shopsClosedMessage: Sorry, we are closed while we add some exciting new items to our inventory. We will open again in just a few minutes. Please come back soon to see what's in store!
copy.howToPayText: How would you like to pay?
copy.ingredientPurchaseIsForMembersOnly: Sorry, only Members can use Ingredients for this!
copy.goldBalanceLacking: You need #MTX_AMT# more #MTX_NAME# to make this purchase!
copy.ingBalanceLacking: You need #ING_AMT# more #ING_NAME# to make this purchase!
copy.mixedBalanceLacking: You need #ING_AMT# more #ING_NAME# or #MTX_AMT# more #MTX_NAME# to make this purchase!
copy.catalog_expiring_soon: Time Left To Get: <font color="#FF0000">###DAYSLEFT###</font> Day###PLURALIZER###
copy.confirm_buy: Are you sure you want to buy this item?
copy.confirm_buy_multiple: Are you sure you want to buy these items?
copy.confirm_buy_hair: Are you sure you want to buy this item? This will replace your current #ITEM#.
copy.confirm_buy_all: Are you sure you want to buy all of the items you are trying on?
copy.confirm_buy_all_hair: Are you sure you want to buy all of the items you are trying on? This will replace your current #ITEM#.
copy.confirm_buy_home: Buy a new home and replace your old home? Your home items will be returned to storage.
copy.confirm_buy_gender_copy: This item cannot be worn by #GENDERS#! You can still purchase this item for use in quests.
copy.alert_buy_gender_copy: This item can only be worn by #OPPGENDERS#! #GENDERS# cannot get this item!
copy.purchase_postcard_success: The postcard was sent to your friend!
copy.purchase_giftset_success: A gift package was sent to your friend's home. You can find your new items in your Leaf Journal. Would you like to wear your new items now?
copy.purchase_success_dyes: Your purchase is complete! You can find your new dye in your Pouch.
copy.purchase_success_hair: Your purchase is complete! Enjoy your new hairstyle!
copy.purchase_success_spa: Your purchase is complete! Enjoy your new style!
copy.purchase_success_party: Your purchase is complete! You can find your new party supplies in your Pouch.
copy.purchase_success_storage: Your purchase is complete! You can find your new item in your Storage Chest.
copy.purchase_success_home: Your purchase is complete! Enjoy your new home!
copy.purchase_success_garden: Your purchase is complete! You can find your new seed packs in your Pouch.
copy.purchase_success_sweet: Your purchase is complete! You can find your new sweets in your Pouch.
copy.purchase_success_wardrobe: Your purchase is complete! You can find your new clothes in your Leaf Journal. Would you like to wear your new clothes now?
copy.purchase_success_wardrobe_trunc: Your purchase is complete! You can find your new clothes in your Leaf Journal.
copy.purchase_success_wardrobe_saveoutfit: Your purchase is complete! You can find your new clothes in your Leaf Journal. Would you like to wear your new clothes now?
copy.purchase_success_wardrobe_saveoutfit_alr: This outfit has already been saved.
copy.purchase_success_wardrobe_saveoutfit_wai: This outfit is in the process of being saved.
copy.purchase_success_wardrobe_saveoutfit_max: You have no more open spaces for outfits! Please remove a saved outfit.
copy.purchase_success_wardrobe_saveoutfit_buy: Would you like to purchase another Outfit tab to save this outfit?

You've chosen an Animal Friend named #NAME#!
Click here to learn how to take care of your Animal Friend.
copy.purchase_success_giftset1:
You sent a Gift Set to:

copy.purchase_success_giftset2: You can find a matching set in your Leaf Journal. Would you like to wear your new clothes now?
copy.purchase_fail: Sorry, looks like we're out of stock right now. Try again later!
copy.pouch_insufficient: You do not have enough #NAME# to buy this. You need #AMOUNT# more.
copy.pouch_insufficient_for_adoption: You do not have enough #NAME# to choose this animal. You need #AMOUNT# more.
copy.outfit_item_delayed: Sorry, there seems to be a delay with your item. Please check your wardrobe to wear it.
copy.space_insufficient: You do not have enough space for any more #NAME# items.
copy.space_insufficient_to_buy_outfit: You do not have enough space to get this outfit.
copy.space_insufficient_to_buy_multiple: You do not have enough space in your wardrobe to get all.
copy.already_have_a_friend: You currently have an Animal Friend in your care. Only one Animal Friend can be cared for at a time.
copy.tagalong_overwrite_adopt: Your Clickables Butterfly will disappear if you adopt an Animal Friend! Are you sure you want to adopt an Animal Friend?
copy.confirm_adopt: Are you sure you want to choose this animal?

copy.current_skincolor: This is your current skin tone.
copy.current_eyecolor: This is your current eye color.
